    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public static TemporalDifference generate(VehicleState vehicleState)
        Determines the current schedule adherence for the vehicle. If vehicle at a stop with a scheduled departure time then the schedule adherence for that stop is returned. Otherwise will look at when the vehicle is expected to be at the next stop with a scheduled time and provide the expected schedule adherence for that stop. Doing it this way is useful because it allows the schedule adherence to be updated while the vehicle is in between stops.
        Parameters:
        vehicleState -
        Returns:
        The real-time schedule adherence for the vehicle, or null if vehicle is not predictable or there are no upcoming stops with a schedule time.
